CatDescriptText: Cutline of image published in Pittsburgh Courier newspaper, October 12, 1957, pg. 2 reads: "Swing It, Daddy! - Bet you didn't believe your eyes, but it's true nevertheless. That's Irving Johnson, hefty owner of the Flamingo Hotel tripping the light fantastic with lovely Sara Lou Harris, here last week, to model for a fashion show presented by the Pittsburgh Chapter of the national Council of Negro Women at the Penn-Sheraton Hotel.  The pair is swinging on that terpsichorean torture, the Cha Cha Cha, and presented an unusually interesting contrast in figures, to say the least. - Harris Photo."
TitMainTitle: Sara Lou Harris wearing tight fitting strapless gown, dancing with Irving Johnson for fashion show in Penn -Sheraton Hotel
